front.description: A photograph of Angkor Wat across a lake, at sunset.

back.description: A simple postcard back including a description of Angkor Wat: The spectacular Angkor Wat 'the temple mountain' rises 65 metres and dates back to the 8th century. Its moat, enclosures and towers were constructed in the Khmer method symbolizing the centre of the Hindu Universe, Mount Meru.
back.transcription: បិទមាត់! Shut up JP
